pages.title: Cooking soups
pages.text: First step to prepare a soup is to find all needed ingredients.Then combine them in the crafting grid with a stewpot to get stewpot with raw soup.The second step is to cook the soup: right-click with raw soup stewpot item on the fired (use any type of lighters) cooking pot.After a while cooking pot will stop boiling(particles will disappear).Click on a cooking pot with a bowl to get soup.

pages.title: Eating soups
pages.text: Soups have 3 types of nourishing: light soup, middle soup and thick soup.Thick soup gives more food points then light soup.Right-click(DON'T HOLD THE MOUSE BUTTON!) with the food item to eat a portion.Every soup has 4 portions.
Cooking pot is also used for cooking rice and porridge.Rice and porridge have 2 portions, that can be eaten by right-click, like a soup.
